pkgmetadata.longdescription: Pretty Timelines // A library for creating time based charts, like Gantt or timelines. Possible outputs include 'ggplot' diagrams, 'Plotly' graphs, 'Highchart' widgets and 'data.frames'. Results can be used in the 'RStudio' viewer pane, in 'RMarkdown' documents or in 'Shiny' apps. In the interactive outputs created by 'Plotly.js' and 'Highcharts.js', you can interact with the plot using mouse hover or zoom.
